description:
“Only you are special”

After school, Nakayama Koutarou returns to school to pick up something he forgot, only to find Shimotsuki Shiho sleeping in the empty classroom.

She is rumored to be the main interest of Ryuuzaki Ryouma, the popular guy forming a harem in the class, but she always has a blank expression, and no one has ever seen her smile.

Yet right now, those white fingers are holding Koutarou’s hand—–!?

The “secret relationship” between a heroine and a mob begins!>
